name: prometheus
note: Prometheus has a very unclear definition of 'end of life': Every 6 weeks, a new minor release cycle begins. After 6 weeks, minor releases generally no longer receive bugfixes. Keep prometheus updated to the latest version. Approximate 'end of life' can be viewed here: endoflife.date.

name: alertmanager
note: Alertmanager versions do not have a specific 'end of life'
